successes.title: 3Doodler: The World's First 3D Printing Pen
successes.description: It's a pen that can draw in the air! 3Doodler is the 3D printing pen you can hold in your hand. Lift your imagination off the page!

Pledges.description: HALL OF FAME: Thanks for your contribution! Even if you aren't ready for a 3Doodler you can still drink the kool-aid with us, get updates, and make the Hall of Fame on our website.

SELLERS ON ETSY SPECIAL: We're collaborating with some fantastic wire artist sellers on Etsy to produce the very first professional 3Doodles. Own a piece of history with one of these limited edition 3D creations from WiredbyBud and Sparkflight. Read more below under "SELLERS ON ETSY SPECIAL".
EARLY BIRDS: Full 3Doodler pen (one of the first 100!), PLUS a bag of mixed color plastic AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model.
3DOODLERS: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS two bags of mixed color plastic AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model.
MORE 3DOODLERS: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS two bags of mixed color plastic AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by November.
DECEMBER 3DOODLERS: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS two bags of mixed color plastic AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by December.

NEW YEAR'S 3DOODLERS: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS two bags of mixed color plastic AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by January 2014. Please do not order if you want your 3Doodler by the Holidays.

FEBRUARY 3DOODLERS: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS two bags of mixed color plastic AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by February 2014.
COLOR-TASTIC: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS 10 bags of plastic (each bag a different color) AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model.

MORE COLOR-TASTIC: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS 10 bags of plastic (each bag a different color) AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by November.

DECEMBER COLOR-TASTIC: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS 10 bags of plastic (each bag a different color) AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by December.

NEW YEAR'S COLOR-TASTIC: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS 10 bags of plastic (each bag a different color) AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by January 2014. Please do not order if you want your 3Doodler by the Holidays.

FEBRUARY COLOR-TASTIC: Full 3Doodler pen, PLUS 10 bags of plastic (each bag a different color) AND a Hall of Fame mention. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by February 2014.

COLOR-TASTIC + SELLERS ON ETSY SPECIAL: By popular demand we are now offering a full 3Doodler pen, PLUS 10 different color bags of plastic, PLUS an SELLERS ON ETSY SPECIAL limited edition 3D creation. This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model.

ARTIST'S SPECIAL (ELE MCKAY) + NOVEMBER COLORTASTIC: Limited edition 3Doodled work by Ele McKay (value $100), the full 3Doodler pen, plus 10 bags of plastic (each bag a different color). This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by November 2013. See Update #9 for more details.

ARTIST'S SPECIAL (ECCO PIERCE) + NOVEMBER COLORTASTIC: Limited edition 3Doodled work by Ecco Pierce (value $100), the full 3Doodler pen, plus 10 bags of plastic (each bag a different color). This is for a final version 3Doodler, not a pre-production model. To be delivered by November 2013. See Update #9 for more details.

ÃœBER EARLY ADOPTER: Get involved in the creative process and play with the 3Doodler MONTHS before full production begins! We are looking for four people who want to help test pre-production models and provide valuable feedback. You will receive one of the first ever 3Doodlers, help us refine the product, and explore creative possibilities before it hits the wider community. You will also receive a final production version of the 3Doodler when it ships.

WOBBLEWORKS SPECIAL: Full 3Doodler pen AND membership to an exclusive beta tester mailing list for all future WobbleWorks products! PLUS spend a day at WobbleWorks (travel not included), explore our workspace at the "Artisans Asylum", join us for lunch and dinner, and receive a signed or engraved 3Doodler!
